column5: Ok first heres a nice couple of pics.Seems for sure, this stand is an afternoon/earlly evening spot.Now that Im feeling much better,I,ll be out there. Love the white around the eyes.I can tell forsure,but it might be a button.Real wide tail on this one.       This one I know is eating  apples, as I have seen some on the ground in that spot.    Ok now the mistry??????????  Same deer,I think I can see buttons.    The ones before,,,,,,,,      Besides the old straggly apple trees,what is it that gets them to do the same thing?????? I have not put any scent there since the 2nd of Oct.   As for the days events. I hit the climber stand this morning.Boy was the dew heavy.I was damp already by the time I got to the stand. I seen some turkeys around,but not shootable. Boy did it feel great to finally get back out there. Back again in the AM.
You do know that you just have to sit on top of my airconditioning unit and wait... correct??
Fun being a PITA from the other side of the world...
This might sound skeery to you me brudder but some of dem tails look good.
Yer on the list.
Tanks, me son. You're on de list also.
Did you happen to take a leak on your ladder stand ?    Theres gotta be some kind of smell on your ladder. I also think thats a fawn buck with buttons.
Am I on the list too B?  I'll put you on mine aswell
dang, I never make the list   LOL
No I do not leak near my stands.   Man am I getting alot of tail this season.LOL Yes to you aswell. I got contacts.  Your on my hit list Terry.
Nice pics, not long now. RF
Hey Brian, nice animals bud.  I'd take that button over the big buck any day.
Hey Phil. Yep me too. Good eats.
Well I checked out the stand before leaving today. I dont know. I even sniffed it too.
did the camera catch you sniffing  if so post pictures   please....LOL
Even just the smell of your hands is enough to get their attention.  See anything today ? I seen a doe and fawn friday night.
That was your stand I peed on? What's a button?
Nice Brian.   When are you going to make a choice and shoot it??  LOL Some nice ones in those pics!!! Jacques
So, you're hunting over bait too?
could be what holds your pants together at the belly or it could be a pre- velvet spike  ( the beginning growth of an antler )   Also something i should stop pushing on my wife
good pics,  thats def. a button buck.  mmmmmmm good eating.  jason
The apples are fom the trees that are there. Im not putting anything out. Dont need too,they got a whole corn field to feed on.
